sections.heading: Context: Event Wayfinding

media.alt: Signer mapping a simple route on a flat surface
media.caption: Use CL:B as a mini-map for clarity

sections.body: For logistics, lay down a **CL:B surface** (map). Mark **ENTRANCE**, **PARKING**, **ROOM#**, then trace **path**: **ENTRANCE â†’ STRAIGHT â†’ TURN-RIGHT â†’ ROOM 204.** Keep each step short.

sections.heading: Structure: Time â†’ Topic â†’ Comment
sections.body: Announcements still use **TIME â†’ TOPIC â†’ COMMENT**. Example: **SATURDAY 2PM â†’ WORKSHOP â†’ ROOM 204, PARKING BACK-LOT, INTERPRETER PROVIDED.**

sections.heading: Technique: Route Clarity on CL:B
sections.body: 1) Place **start** and **destination** first. 2) Show **one path step** at a time. 3) Use **NEAR/FAR** and **UPSTAIRS/DOWNSTAIRS** if relevant. 4) Face/gaze follows the route, then make **eye contact** to confirm.

sections.heading: Partner Drill: Ask & Guide

media.alt: Two signers asking and giving directions
media.caption: Follow-up questions keep routes accurate

sections.body: A asks: **WHERE WORKSHOP?** B maps route on **CL:B** with **3 steps**, then adds **one accessibility detail**. A repeat-backs the path to confirm. Swap roles.

options: Pause briefly so the listener can track
